Components.Abstract.AST

Class CASTComp

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • Components.CPAMOJAComponent
            • Components.Abstract.AST.CASTComp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IASTComp, INodeObject, IPAMOJAComponent, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener

    public class CASTComp
extends CPAMOJAComponent
implements IASTComp, INodeObject, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    This class creates an AST component which holds the structural representation of an AST.

    The AST component observes the Abstractor component and maintains consistency between its AST and the AST of the Abstractor component.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setAbstractor

        public void setAbstractor(IAbstractionComp aAbstractor)
        Connects to the Abstractor component via its interface. It sets the value of Abstractor, registers for property change events and retrieves current value of AST object.
        Specified by:
        setAbstractor in interface IASTComp
        Parameters:
        aAbstractor - an instance of the Abstractor component.

        Specified by:
        setASTStructure in interface IASTComp
        Parameters:
        aASTStructure - the CNode object describing the AST structure.

      • propertyChange

        public void propertyChange(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent evt)
        This method gets called when a property of the Abstractor Component is changed. It deDetermines if the property change is from the AbstractorComp component. If so, it retrieves the AST object of the AbstractorComp, updates its AST object and notifies its observers.
        Specified by:
        propertyChange in interface java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
        Parameters:
        evt - event object with the new value

      • getNode

        Returns the structural representation of the AST .
        Specified by:
        getNode in interface INodeObject
        Returns:
        the AST stored in this component.
